headline: BlackRock's GIP in talks with AES, Ford's US sales rise in Q3
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including the BlackRock-owned (BLK) Global Infrastructure Partners' reported bid to acquire AES Corp. (AES), Ford (F) sharing US auto sales in its third quarter, and Carvana (CVNA) receiving an upgrade. Also catch Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi's full interview with Ford CEO Jim Farley To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: BlackRock Expands Outcome Product Suite to Meet Increasing Investor Demand
summary: NEW YORK, October 01, 2025--Today, BlackRock bolstered its Outcome ETF suite with the launch of the iShares Large Cap 10% Target Buffer ETFs. The first ETF in the series, the iShares Large Cap 10% Target Buffer Sep ETF (CBOE:STEN), begins trading today, while the remaining funds will be listed later this month. BlackRock expects the Outcome ETF category to grow from $250 billion to $650 billion by 2030, as investors increasingly seek strategies that deliver more specific goals – such as targeted
